member.name: FDE_SHAREVIOLATION_RESPONSE
member.summary: Specifies the values used by the method to indicate an application's response to a sharing violation that occurs when a file is opened or saved.

member.name: FDE_SHAREVIOLATION_RESPONSE.FDESVR_DEFAULT
member.summary: The application has not handled the event. The dialog displays a UI that indicates that the file is in use and a different file must be chosen.

member.name: FDE_SHAREVIOLATION_RESPONSE.FDESVR_ACCEPT
member.summary: The application has determined that the file should be returned from the dialog.

member.name: FDE_SHAREVIOLATION_RESPONSE.FDESVR_REFUSE
member.summary: The application has determined that the file should not be returned from the dialog.
